item.title: Hadoop-Preparation on servers
item.description: Prepare 3 servers and set up the development environment on each servers for big data computing. I have no configurated instances on Cloud Server, like AWS, Alibaba, etc., as my student discount was expired. Fortunatly, I have a new computer which is good enough to run multiple virtual machines.
